title: Power Girl: Power Trip
description: The fan-favorite writing team of Jimmy Palmiotti and Justin Gray (JONAH HEX, TERRA) team with popular aritst Amanda Conner (JSA CLASSIFIED, TERRA) for the rip-roaring solo adventures of Power Girl. She bursts from the pages of the JUSTICE SOCIETY OF AMERICA to star in her own series.Collects CLASSIFIED #1-4, POWER GIRL #1-12
author: Geoff Johns
